**Meritorious:** **Experience with Migration Testing**


Background in supporting data or system migrations, particularly validating transitions between legacy and modern platforms.

 **Mainframe/AS-400 Knowledge**


Familiarity with mainframe systems (e.g. AS-400)

  

**Last day to apply**: 19-09-2025

 **About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Expert System Engineer
description:
**Uppdragsbeskrivning**

**Om uppdraget**  

En erfaren konsult sökes till ett strategiskt team som utvecklar och förvaltar en intern utvecklingsportal (Internal Development Portal). Portalen är en central del för att möjliggöra effektiv, säker och regelrätt applikationsutveckling i en reglerad verksamhet.


Rollen innebär att vidareutveckla CI/CD-processer, bygga och förbättra DevSecOps-arkitektur, automatisera infrastruktur samt integrera nya funktioner i portalen. Arbetet omfattar utvecklingsportaler, verktyg för infrastrukturorkestrering och implementering av en omfattande teknisk roadmap.

**Ansvarsområden och arbetsuppgifter**  

Du kommer att arbeta med:

**Infrastrukturhantering**

* Automatiserad provisionering av utvecklingsmiljöer och infrastrukturella komponenter.
* GitOps-baserade arbetsflöden för hantering av infrastruktur.
* API-baserad hantering av resurser som nätverk, behörigheter och säkerhetslösningar.
* Stöd för databaser (NoSQL och relationsdatabaser), inklusive anslutningsinformation och brandväggsregler.

**Applikationsutveckling och leverans**

* Automatiserad registrering av nya system i konfigurationsdatabaser.
* Stöd för meddelandebaserad kommunikation och applikationsmallar.
* Hantering av kodbaser med flera komponenter (monorepo).
* Standardiserade dokumentationsmallar, inklusive arkitekturmodeller och beslutsposter.
* Stöd för API-utveckling och publicering med tillhörande specifikationshantering.

**Observability**

* Skapa standardiserade dashboards för nya applikationer med åtkomsthantering.
* Automatiserad integration av applikationsövervakning i utvecklingsflödet.

**Säkerhet och regelefterlevnad**

* Automatiserad hantering av behörigheter och roller för utvecklare.
* Integration av säkerhetskomponenter i utvecklingsflödet.
* Runtime-scanning av produktionsmiljöer med rapportering till utvecklingsplattformen.

**Kravprofil**

* Minst 10 års erfarenhet som konsult inom systemutveckling, DevOps eller plattformsutveckling.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av utvecklingsportaler och infrastrukturorkestrering.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i moderna programmeringsspråk och CI/CD-verktyg.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologi och molnplattformar.
* Förmåga att tydligt kommunicera tekniska koncept till både tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter.

**Kompetensnivå**

* Nivå 4–5: Expertkompetens inom området, betraktas som specialist eller guru.
* Van att leda och driva projekt självständigt på hög nivå.

**Språkkrav**

* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska, både skriftligt och muntligt, då hela uppdraget genomförs och dokumenteras på svenska.

 **Om Rasulson Consulting**  

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
**Avigna** is hiring for a **"Senior Data Scientist Consultant"** role.


Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for European customers. We are looking for a **Senior Data Scientist Consultant to** join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations and workflow improvements, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient cost and schedule management.  Proven experience in Google Cloud Platform (Vertex AI, BigQuery, Dataflow, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run) and Python-based ML pipelines using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.

Other company benefits

title: Data Platform Engineer
description:
Matsmart-Motatos is a different kind of food store, challenging the thought of sustainable consumption. We’re a European grocery e-commerce, aiding the sustainable reform of our food system by giving everyone a chance to save our planet in an effortless way. We partner with food and FMCG companies to save products at risk of going to waste by re-selling them at discounted prices directly to consumers: sustainable, affordable and accessible to all.


Today, our shops are open in Sweden, Finland, Denmark, Germany and Austria. Working at Matsmart-Motatos, you will join our fight against food waste and contribute to making the world a better place.

#### **Role Overview**


At Motatos, our data team can only move as fast as the infrastructure that supports it. That’s where you come in.


We work with massive amounts of data - powering one of Sweden’s biggest e-commerces - and every insight, model, and decision depends on strong foundations. Your role is to make sure those foundations are rock solid.


We’re looking for a data platform engineer who thrives on building infrastructure at scale. From Terraform to CI/CD pipelines, cloud resources to data platforms, you’ll design and maintain the systems that let our team deliver with speed and confidence.


This isn’t a background role -it’s the enabler. You’ll be the backbone of the data team, making sure data flows securely, reliably, and efficiently so that the rest of the team can focus on creating value. Sounds interesting? Contact us!

#### **Responsibilities**

* Architect, provision, configure, and operate Snowflake infrastructure on **Azure** (warehouses, databases, schemas, roles, permissions, external stages) using Terraform or equivalent IaC.
  
* Manage associated Azure cloud infrastructure required by the data platform: storage (e.g. Blob / Data Lake Gen2), networking, identity & access (Azure Entra ID, managed identities), secret management, virtual networks, etc.
  
* If needed, support occasional Google Cloud components: e.g. storage buckets or services, IAM / permissions in GCP, etc.
  
* Build, maintain, and enhance CI/CD pipelines / workflows for infrastructure (say Terraform on Azure) and data assets (schemas, warehouse changes, roles, permissions).
  
* Embed security & governance: RBAC, least privilege, audit logging, compliance, secrets management. Use Azure’s tools (Key Vault, Azure AD roles) to secure credentials and access.
  
* Monitor & optimize performance and cost for Snowflake usage on Azure: warehouse sizing, auto-suspend / scale, query performance, usage patterns; also watch Azure costs for storage / networking / compute.
  
* Setup observability & alerting: logs, metrics, query latency, failures; detect drift in infrastructure or configuration. Use Azure monitoring tools, Snowflake’s built-in metrics, etc.
  
* Work with data engineering / analytics folks to support ingestion pipelines, schema evolution, transformations; ensure dev/test/prod environments aligned and reproducible.
  
* Document architecture, standards, deployment / rollback procedures, best practices; ensure recoverability, fault tolerance, and environment parity.

#### **Required Qualifications**

* 3-5+ years (or more, depending on seniority) in data platform or infrastructure engineering.
  
* Strong experience with **Snowflake**, in particular on Azure: designing schemas, warehouses, roles/permissions, external stages, performance tuning.
  
* Proven experience with **Terraform** (or comparable IaC) to manage Snowflake and Azure resources.
  
* Deep knowledge of Azure services relevant for data infrastructure: Azure Blob / Data Lake, Azure Entra ID, Key Vault (secrets), networking (VNets), permissions; familiarity with Google Cloud is a plus.
  
* Strong SQL skills; experience optimizing queries, performance tuning, working with semi-structured data.
  
* Good Python skills
  
* Experience designing and operating CI/CD pipelines (Terraform + Snowflake + Azure).
  
* Being familiar with Docker and containerized solutions
  
* Solid security mindset: access control, encryption, auditing, least privilege, secret management.
  
* Ability to make trade-offs between cost, performance, complexity; experience with cost monitoring / cost management in Azure & Snowflake.
  
* Experience working end-to-end: from raw data ingestion to clean, transformed, modeled data for dashboards, ML, operational use.
  
* Good communication; can work across teams (Cloud / DevOps / Security / Data Engineering).

title: DevOps Linux
description:
Är du en skicklig DevOps-specialist som brinner för Linux och vill ta nästa steg i karriären?


Camai söker nu en erfaren och passionerad DevOps Linux-konsult som vill vara med och forma framtidens IT-infrastruktur. Hos oss får du arbeta i en dynamisk, tekniskt utmanande miljö med de senaste verktygen och metoderna – allt för att optimera och effektivisera våra kunders system. Vi erbjuder en företagskultur som präglas av innovation, samarbete och kontinuerlig utveckling – här gör din expertis och dina idéer verklig skillnad.

**Vi erbjuder**

* Spännande och varierande projekt med både privata och offentliga kunder.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med molnteknologier, automatisering och containerlösningar i framkant.
* En modern arbetsmiljö där din kompetens värderas högt och din utveckling prioriteras.
* Stöd från ett engagerat team och en organisation som satsar på din karriär.

**Om rollen**


Som DevOps Linux-konsult kommer du att vara en central del i våra projekt och bidra till att skapa effektiva, skalbara och säkra lösningar. Du kommer bland annat att:

* Utveckla och underhålla **CI/CD-pipelines** för smidigare leverans.
* Automatisera/övervaka applikationer med verktyg som **Jenkins, GitLab och Terraform**.
* Arbeta med **Docker, Kubernetes** och molnplattformar som **AWS eller Azure**.
* Implementera **konfigurationshantering och automatisering** med verktyg som Ansible och Packer.
* Optimera processer med hjälp av **Atlassian-verktyg** (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket).
* Driva processer självständigt och ta ansvar i projekt med stort förtroende och frihet.

**Vi söker dig som**

* Har flerårig erfarenhet av **containerteknologier** (Docker, Kubernetes).
* Behärskar scriptspråk som **Bash, Groovy eller Python**.
* Har daglig erfarenhet av **Terraform** och Infrastructure as Code.
* Har goda kunskaper i **Ansible, Packer** och andra automatiseringsverktyg.
* Är van användare av **Jira, Confluence och Bitbucket**.
* Har arbetat med **agila metoder** som Scrum.
* Förstår **systemarkitektur** och kan göra välgrundade teknologival.
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i **svenska och engelska**, både i tal och skrift.


Vi ser också att du har ett genuint tekniskt intresse och drivs av att arbeta med den senaste tekniken, du håller dig uppdaterad om branschens utveckling och gillar att omsätta nya idéer i praktiken.

 **Start**: Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare

 **Placeringsort:** Stockholm

**Ansökan:** Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match

 **Vad vi står för:**  

Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.


Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!

 **Varför ska du välja oss?**  

Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.

 *Hoppas att du vill vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt!*

title: AWS DevOps Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 AWS DevOps Engineer
   

  

**This** 
**is** 
**Worldline**
 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 At Worldline, delivering an awesome payment experience that our customers love is what we burn for. Our cloud-native acquiring platform is processing billions of card transactions including authorization processing and clearing and settlement for our customers to trust. Currently, we are looking for a skilled platform-focused Senior DevOps Engineer to join our Platform Engineering team, where you'll focus on creating scalable, self-service infrastructure solutions that empowers our product teams.
   

  

**Day-to-Day Responsibilities**
 You will help build the Engineering Platform, enabling developers to independently create, test, launch, manage, and monitor real-time authorization platform through self-service and continuous improvement. As part of a dedicated, domain-focused team, you will help design and deliver an internal platform that:
   

  

* Empowers development teams with seamless, self-service access to tools and technologies
* Minimizes non-development overhead and cross-team delays
* Reduces cognitive load around security, governance, and compliance
* Enables fast, independent software delivery
* Measures success through clear, observable business outcomes


 Your work will directly support internal teams in innovating, building, and operating at scale, and will include participating in an on-call rotation schedule.
   

  

**Who Are We Looking For?** 
  

  

* You are passionate about empowering teams to work more autonomously throughout the development process, enabling faster feature delivery and quicker recovery from production issues.
* As a self-starter, you excel at teamwork, demonstrating commitment, accountability, consistently supporting your team and collaborating effectively across groups.
* In addition to solid technical skills, you must also have:
+ Strong interpersonal and communication skills
+ Comfortable with unknowns and have a learning mindset
+ Ability to mentor engineers


**What Can't We Do Without**
 We’re looking for a skilled and experienced software developer with at least 5 years of hands-on experience, especially with Python in production environments. You know your way around version control (like Git).
   

  

* You understand the fundamentals of SSO, user authentication and access control, and have exposure to tools like AWS Cognito, Flask, and key protocols like OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect.
* You're skilled in Python and Go, and you have a strong understanding of REST APIs, HTTP(s), especially when using NGINX to manage proxies and handle requests.
* Cloud tech is second nature to you. You’ve worked extensively with AWS — think ELB, Route53, Lambda, IAM, DynamoDB, S3, RDS — and you understand cloud-native networking concepts like VPCs, subnets, peering, transit gateways, service meshes, NATs, and firewalls.
* You understand the complexities of AWS multi-account strategies and have used Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation) to automate the lifecycle of account provisioning.
* You have practical experience in CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Docker for containerization, ideally within AWS ECS.
* Degree in Computer Science, engineering, or similar. Fluent in English and/or Swedish with a valid Swedish work permit.
* Bonus points if you’ve got some experience with React too.
* If this sounds like a good fit, we’d love to hear from you.


**Skills We'd Like**
 Hands-on experience with DevOps culture, automation, lean processes, metrics, and resilience.
   

  

* AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional certification (or equivalent expertise) is a strong plus.
* Publicly available code, writing, or projects that showcase your experience.
* Experience from developing secure and/or PCI-DSS certified solutions is considered an advantage.


**Perks & Benefits**
 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
   

  

* Being a part of a company guided by a strong purpose to do good and recognized as top 1% of the most sustainable companies in all sectors worldwide
* Health benefits contribution
* Health check – Every 2nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.


**Shape The Evolution**
 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
   

  

**Learn More About Life At Worldline At Jobs.worldline.com**
 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: Senior Data DevOps
description:
We are looking for a
 **Senior Data DevOps** 
 with experience working with a heavily distributed and senior engineering group to join our Data Platform team to support group management, hubs (marketing, ad-monetization, finance), game studios, and strategic projects with data and analytics capabilities. The Data Platform is responsible for collecting and sharing insights from our game studios, finance systems, and 3rd party data vendors.
 



 The Data Platform is a distributed team by design, operating with Open Source principles to empower the team and studios to contribute equally. Beyond the core team, the team collaborates on a weekly basis with the studios in the portfolio to improve data quality and richness. This role will be responsible for expanding processes, rituals, and day-to-day project management.
   

  





**YOUR MISSION** 



* Lead the design and implementation of DevOps across data platform projects
* Lead by example best practices to team and studios
* Create the best possible development environment and deployment process that makes contributing to data projects a pleasure
* Coordinate and collaborate with a talented network of engineers at each studio
* Be inquisitive about current DevOps strategies and eager to evaluate alternatives



  





**YOUR BACKSTORY** 



* 5+ years of experience in data engineering and DevOps
* Experience with Configuration Management tools (Puppet, Chef, Ansible)
* Hands-on experience building infrastructure from the ground up with IaC solutions
* Passion for monitoring and logging with tools like Grafana and Kibana
* Experience with common development tools and practices, including Python environment
* Eye for security and data privacy both from a policy perspective and practical engineering tooling
* Comfortable being a first responder to data infrastructure issues
* Well-acquainted with AWS
* Communicate effectively with a cross-functional international team
* Experience with git and how (and why) to perform an interactive rebase



  





**NICE TO HAVE** 



* Snowflake database management experience
* Airflow v2
* Pulumi as IaC
* Bachelor in Computer Science



**Stillfront Group** 
 is a global games company founded in 2010. We develop digital games for a diverse gaming audience and our broad games portfolio is enjoyed by almost 70 million people every month. Stillfront is focused on realizing synergies by connecting and empowering game teams globally through our Stillops platform. We are a fast-growing company and an active global strategic acquirer. Our 1,500+ professionals thrive in an organization that embodies the spirit of entrepreneurship.
